items.title: Brokerages BULLISH on Gala Precision IPO; GMP jumps 45%; Should You Bid?
items.description: Several brokerages, including Deven Choksi Research, Anand Rathi, Swastika Investmart, and Choice, have shared their outlook on the Gala Precision Engineering IPO for the investors

items.title: ECOS Mobility IPO allotment today; check status, GMP, likely listing gains
items.description: Once the allotment is finalised, investors can check their allotment status on the BSE, NSE, or via Link Intime India, the issue's registrar. Here are the direct links to check the allotment status

items.title: Bazaar Style IPO: Subscription soars on Day 2, GMP up 20%; should you bid?
items.description: The three-day subscription window to bid for the Bazaar Style Retail IPO, available at a price band of Rs 370-389 and a lot size of 38 shares, closes tomorrow

items.title: Lights, Camera, IPO: VFX firm Identical Brains Studios files DRHP; details
items.description: The company will offer a fresh issuance of up to 36,94,000 equity shares with a face value of Rs 10 apiece through the book-building route
